Uses of Package
com.vtuberrush.src.scenes

Packages that use com.vtuberrush.src.scenes
Package
Description
com.vtuberrush.src.main
 
com.vtuberrush.src.managers
 
com.vtuberrush.src.scenes
 
com.vtuberrush.src.ui
 
  • Classes in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes used by com.vtuberrush.src.main
    Class
    Description
    Editing
    An editing game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the editing and modification of level tiles.
    GameOver
    An game over game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the resetting of the playing game scene when an end game condition is met such as finishing all waves in a map or when all lives of the player has been lost.
    Menu
    An menu game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the the changing of different game states and moving across different game scenes.
    Playing
    A playing game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the game loop.
    Settings
    An settings game scene is a subclass of a game scene is a future use scene for adjusting the settings, currently being used by the author as acknowledgement to all the players currently playing the game.
  • Classes in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes used by com.vtuberrush.src.managers
    Class
    Description
    Playing
    A playing game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the game loop.
  • Classes in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes used by com.vtuberrush.src.scenes
    Class
    Description
    GameScene
    A game scene is a superclass object that facilitates the rendering and animation of tiles across different subclasses, allows interaction of the mouse with other game objects such as buttons, and allows interacting with the main game class depending on the current game state.
    A subclass inheriting a game scene implements a set of pre-defined methods in SceneMethods related to rendering objects to the screen and listening for mouse events.
    SceneMethods
    Defines a default set of methods that are required to be implemented by all subclasses inheriting game scenes.
  • Classes in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes used by com.vtuberrush.src.ui
    Class
    Description
    Editing
    An editing game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the editing and modification of level tiles.
    Playing
    A playing game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the game loop.
